TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PeerResolverMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Determines the type of peer resolver being used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the specified peer resolver is unavailable, a <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown when an attempt to use the resolver is made.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerResolverMode Auto = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Automatically determines the type of resolver to use from the information set on the binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If available, a custom resolver is used. If one is unavailable, the PNRP peer resolver is used. A peer resolver is considered "available" if the <xref:%2A> System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerCustomResolverSettings.Address?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True and <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerCustomResolverSettings.Binding%2A> properties are set on it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerResolverMode Custom = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.PeerResolverMode Pnrp = int32(1)
